## QueryConstraintType type

Describes the different query constraints available in this SDK.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type QueryConstraintType = 'where' | 'orderBy' | 'limit' | 'limitToLast' | 'startAt' | 'startAfter' | 'endAt' | 'endBefore';
```
